name: Michael Harrison
bio: Military veteran with over 20 years of construction leadership experience. Michael founded MH Construction with a vision to revolutionize the industry through technology and military-inspired excellence. He holds an MBA in Construction Management and served as a US Army Corps of Engineers officer.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Technology leader with expertise in construction innovation and operational excellence. Sarah oversees MH Construction's digital transformation initiatives, including AI estimation tools and 3D project visualization. She holds degrees from MIT in Civil Engineering and Computer Science.

name: John Doe
bio: Experienced project manager with 15 years in commercial and institutional construction. John specializes in complex projects requiring precise coordination and timeline management. He was instrumental in the successful delivery of the Summer's Hub Community Center.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Creative architect with a passion for sustainable design and innovative building solutions. Jane leads our design team and works closely with clients to bring their visions to life while ensuring practical construction implementation.

name: Mike Johnson
bio: Hands-on construction supervisor with expertise in quality control and safety management. Mike ensures every project meets MH Construction's high standards while maintaining strict safety protocols on all job sites.

name: Sarah Williams
bio: Detail-oriented estimator who works with our AI-powered estimation tools to provide accurate project costs and timelines. Sarah's expertise ensures clients receive transparent and competitive pricing for all projects.

name: Robert Davis
bio: Dedicated safety manager committed to maintaining MH Construction's perfect safety record. Robert develops and implements comprehensive safety protocols ensuring every worker returns home safely each day.

name: Lisa Martinez
bio: Creative interior design specialist who helps clients select finishes, materials, and design elements that bring their vision to life. Lisa works with our 3D visualization tools to help clients see their project before construction begins.
